body:
Address 0x15d is not aligned.

On Wed, 29 Jun 2016, 16:58 Alex Brainman <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Please provide a full report with GOTRACEBACK=system env var.
> Does it crash with Go1.7 beta2?
>
> It does crashes at the tip:
>
> c:\dev\src\issues\issue16206>go version
> go version devel +85a4f44 Tue Jun 28 22:09:00 2016 +0000 windows/amd64
>
> c:\dev\src\issues\issue16206>go run -race main.go
> panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
> [signal 0xc0000005 code=0x0 addr=0x15d pc=0x458ef2]
>
> goroutine 1 [running]:
> panic(0x4fa340, 0xc0420040c0)
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/panic.go:500 +0x1bc fp=0xc042029e20 sp=0xc042029d90
> runtime.panicmem()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/panic.go:62 +0x74 fp=0xc042029e50 sp=0xc042029e20
> runtime.sigpanic()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/signal_windows.go:161 +0x97 fp=0xc042029e80 sp=0xc042029e50
> racecallatomic()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/race_amd64.s:342 +0x62 fp=0xc042029e88 sp=0xc042029e80
> sync/atomic.StoreInt64()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/race_amd64.s:234 +0xc fp=0xc042029e90 sp=0xc042029e88
> main.main()
>     c:/dev/src/issues/issue16206/main.go:46 +0x20d fp=0xc042029f40 sp=0xc042029e90
> runtime.main()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/proc.go:183 +0x17b fp=0xc042029f90 sp=0xc042029f40
> runtime.goexit()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2086 +0x1 fp=0xc042029f98 sp=0xc042029f90
>
> goroutine 17 [syscall, locked to thread]:
> runtime.goexit()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2086 +0x1 fp=0xc04201dfa8 sp=0xc04201dfa0
>
> goroutine 2 [runnable]:
> runtime.forcegchelper()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/proc.go:216 fp=0xc04201bfa0 sp=0xc04201bf98
> runtime.goexit()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2086 +0x1 fp=0xc04201bfa8 sp=0xc04201bfa0
> created by runtime.init.4
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/proc.go:213 +0x3c
>
> goroutine 3 [GC sweep wait]:
> runtime.gopark(0x51d3a0, 0xf355a0, 0x510b97, 0xd, 0x41ed14, 0x1)
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/proc.go:259 +0x104 fp=0xc042017f18 sp=0xc042017ee8
> runtime.goparkunlock(0xf355a0, 0x510b97, 0xd, 0x14, 0x1)
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/proc.go:265 +0x65 fp=0xc042017f58 sp=0xc042017f18
> runtime.bgsweep(0xc04202a000)
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/mgcsweep.go:63 +0xc4 fp=0xc042017f98 sp=0xc042017f58
> runtime.goexit()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2086 +0x1 fp=0xc042017fa0 sp=0xc042017f98
> created by runtime.gcenable
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/mgc.go:195 +0x68
>
> goroutine 4 [runnable]:
> runtime.runfinq()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/mfinal.go:144 fp=0xc042019fa0 sp=0xc042019f98
> runtime.goexit()
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2086 +0x1 fp=0xc042019fa8 sp=0xc042019fa0
> created by runtime.createfing
>     C:/dev/go/src/runtime/mfinal.go:139 +0x7a
> exit status 2
>
> c:\dev\src\issues\issue16206>
>
> Alex
